033/**
034 * This class provides functionality for the x report
035 */
036public class x_report_controller implements Initializable {
037
038    //---------- FXML refs (TableView-only UI) ----------
039    @FXML private TableView<hour_row> x_report_table;
040    @FXML private TableColumn<hour_row, String>  col_hour;
041    @FXML private TableColumn<hour_row, Integer> col_orders;
042    @FXML private TableColumn<hour_row, Integer> col_items;
043    @FXML private TableColumn<hour_row, String>  col_sales;
044
045    //---------- rows from database ----------
046    /**
047     * Class representing a single hour’s metrics from the database.
048     */
049    private static class hour_metrics {
050        int hour;     //0 to 23
051        int orders;
052        int items;
053        double sales;
054    }
055
056    //---------- row wrapper for the FXML TableView----------
057    private static class hour_row {
058        final SimpleStringProperty  hour   = new SimpleStringProperty();
059        final SimpleIntegerProperty orders = new SimpleIntegerProperty();
060        final SimpleIntegerProperty items  = new SimpleIntegerProperty();
061        final SimpleStringProperty  sales  = new SimpleStringProperty();
062        final boolean is_total;
063
064        /**
065         * Constructor for a normal hour row.
066         * @param m - Metrics for this hour
067         */
068        hour_row(hour_metrics m) { this(m, false); }
069        /**
070         * Constructor for an hour row with a total flag.
071         * @param m - Metrics for this hour or totals
072         * @param is_total - Whether this row is the totals row
073         */
074        hour_row(hour_metrics m, boolean is_total) {
075            this.is_total = is_total;
076            hour.set(is_total ? "Total" : String.format("%02d:00", m.hour));
077            orders.set(m.orders);
078            items.set(m.items);
079            sales.set(money(m.sales));
080        }
081    }
082    /**
083     * Initializes the x report controller by binding columns, styling, disabling sorting,
084     * adding a special style for the totals row, and loading today’s data.
085     * @param url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object
086     * @param rb - The resources used to localize the root object
087     */
088    @Override
089    public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle rb) {
090        // Bind columns to properties
091        col_hour.setCellValueFactory(cd -> cd.getValue().hour);
092        col_orders.setCellValueFactory(cd -> cd.getValue().orders.asObject()); 
093        col_items.setCellValueFactory(cd -> cd.getValue().items.asObject()); 
094        col_sales.setCellValueFactory(cd -> cd.getValue().sales);
095
096        //some manual java styling
097        col_hour.setStyle("-fx-alignment: CENTER-LEFT;");
098        col_orders.setStyle("-fx-alignment: CENTER-RIGHT;");
099        col_items.setStyle("-fx-alignment: CENTER-RIGHT;");
100        col_sales.setStyle("-fx-alignment: CENTER-RIGHT;");
101
102        // Keep totals last: disable sorting
103        col_hour.setSortable(false);
104        col_orders.setSortable(false);
105        col_items.setSortable(false);
106        col_sales.setSortable(false);
107
108        // style the last row separately
109        x_report_table.setRowFactory(tv -> new TableRow<hour_row>() {
110            @Override
111            protected void updateItem(hour_row item, boolean empty) {
112                super.updateItem(item, empty);
113                getStyleClass().remove("x-total-row");
114                if (!empty && item != null && item.is_total) {
115                    getStyleClass().add("x-total-row");
116                    setMouseTransparent(true);
117                    setFocusTraversable(false);
118                }
119            }
120        });
121
122        // Last column flexes to fill
123        x_report_table.setColumnResizePolicy(
124            TableView.CONSTRAINED_RESIZE_POLICY_FLEX_LAST_COLUMN
125        );
126
127        refresh_table(); //loads the current day
128    }
129

185    /**
186     * This function handles the run click action to generate the x report for today.
187     * It clears the zero report flag and refreshes the table.
188     * @param event - Trigger for the function to be called
189     */
190    @FXML
191    private void handle_run_click(ActionEvent event) {
192        // When Run is pressed, generate report
193        useful_functions.zero_x_report = false;
194        refresh_table();
195    }
196
197    //---------- data refresh ----------
198    /**
199     * This function rebuilds the table for all 24 hours and appends a totals row.
200     * It shows a zeroed report if the zero flag was set.
201     */
202    private void refresh_table() {
203        List<hour_metrics> metrics;
204
205        if (useful_functions.zero_x_report) {
206            // Show zeros this one time, then clear the flag so it won't persist
207            metrics = new ArrayList<>();
208            useful_functions.zero_x_report = false;
209        } else {
210            metrics = fetch_hourly_metrics(LocalDate.now());
211        }
212
213        //make sure all 24 hours appear
214        Map<Integer, hour_metrics> by_hour = new HashMap<>();
215        for (hour_metrics m : metrics) by_hour.put(m.hour, m);
216
217        var data = javafx.collections.FXCollections.<hour_row>observableArrayList();
218
219        for (int h = 0; h < 24; h++) {
220            hour_metrics m = by_hour.getOrDefault(h, zero_row(h));
221            data.add(new hour_row(m));
222        }
223
224        // last row
225        int total_orders = metrics.stream().mapToInt(m -> m.orders).sum();
226        int total_items  = metrics.stream().mapToInt(m -> m.items).sum();
227        double total_sales = metrics.stream().mapToDouble(m -> m.sales).sum();
228
229        hour_metrics totals = new hour_metrics();
230        totals.orders = total_orders;
231        totals.items  = total_items;
232        totals.sales  = total_sales;
233
234        data.add(new hour_row(totals, true)); // last row = totals
235
236        x_report_table.setItems(data);
237    }
238
239    //---------- database access ----------
240    /**
241     * This function fetches hourly order, item, and sales totals for the given date.
242     * The SQL groups by hour and returns aggregates.
243     * @param date - The date to report on
244     * @return A list of hourly metrics; may be empty
245     */
246    private List<hour_metrics> fetch_hourly_metrics(LocalDate date) {
247        List<hour_metrics> out = new ArrayList<>();
248
249        final String sql = """
250            SELECT
251            EXTRACT(HOUR FROM o.ordertime)::int AS hr,
252            COUNT(DISTINCT o.orderid) AS orders_count,
253            COALESCE(SUM(items_per_order.item_count), 0) AS items_count,
254            COALESCE(SUM(o.ordertotal), 0) AS sales_total
255            FROM orders o
256            LEFT JOIN (
257            SELECT orderid, COUNT(productid) AS item_count
258            FROM orderitems
259            GROUP BY orderid
260            ) AS items_per_order
261            ON items_per_order.orderid = o.orderid
262            WHERE o.orderdate = CURRENT_DATE
263            GROUP BY hr
264            ORDER BY hr;
265        """;
266
267        try (Connection conn = db_connect.getConnection();
268             PreparedStatement ps = conn.prepareStatement(sql);
269             ResultSet rs = ps.executeQuery()) {
270
271            while (rs.next()) {
272                hour_metrics hm = new hour_metrics();
273                hm.hour   = rs.getInt("hr");
274                hm.orders = rs.getInt("orders_count");
275                hm.items  = rs.getInt("items_count");
276                hm.sales  = rs.getDouble("sales_total");
277                out.add(hm);
278            }
279        } catch (Exception e) {
280            //suggested error handling (we shouldn't need this)
281            System.err.println("X Report error: " + e.getClass().getSimpleName() + " — " + e.getMessage());
282        }
283
284        return out;
285    }
286
287    // ---------- helper functions----------
288    /**
289     * This function formats a double value as currency.
290     * @param v - The double value to format as money
291     * @return A formatted string representing the money value
292     */
293    private static String money(double v) {
294        return String.format("$%.2f", v);
295    }
296
297    /**
298     * This function creates an empty hour metrics row for a given hour.
299     * @param hour - The hour index from 0 to 23
300     * @return A metrics object with zeros for all fields
301     */
302    private static hour_metrics zero_row(int hour) {
303        hour_metrics z = new hour_metrics();
304        z.hour = hour;
305        z.orders = 0;
306        z.items = 0;
307        z.sales = 0.0;
308        return z;
309    }
